title: Looking for suggestions for a youthful but strong typeface
content:
I’m designing a logo for a non-profit that provides primarily daycare services to disadvantaged families, but also provides shelter for battered women, educational opportunities, and other family services. They’ve been around since the 60’s and got a bad wrap after a scandal so their new motto is “Proud Past, Promising Future”

The word Baby is in the name and since daycare is what they’re known for, I’m looking for a typeface to reflect a youthful, growing feel, but not childish. Any suggestions?
author: jtnatoli

comments.content:
[Rumba](http://web.archive.org/web/20090906185822/http:/www.laurameseguer.com/proyectos/tipografico/ampliar/11) is the first thing that pops to mind.

In an entirely different vein [Tuff](http://web.archive.org/web/20090906185822/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/tuffoverview.html) might work.
